summary: This document is the First Amendment to the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2018 Trust, executed in October 2018. It amends the trust to allow distributions intended for Karyna Shuliak to be placed into a separate trust for her benefit, with Darren K. Indyke and Richard D. Kahn serving as trustees of that trust.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: He is the grantor who executes this First Amendment to his 2018 Trust, amending its terms.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: He is named as a trustee of the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2018 Trust and is designated to serve as a trustee of any trust created for Karyna Shuliak's benefit under this amendment.

persons.name: Richard D. Kahn
persons.context: He is named as a trustee of the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2018 Trust and is designated to serve as a trustee of any trust created for Karyna Shuliak's benefit under this amendment.

persons.name: Katheryn H. Ruemmler
persons.context: She is listed as a trustee of the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2018 Trust in the preamble of the amendment.

persons.name: Karyna Shuliak
persons.context: She is the beneficiary for whom the trust amendment is made, allowing distributions to her to be placed into a separate trust for her protection and benefit.

persons.name: Daphne Wallace
persons.context: She is the notary public who witnessed and notarized the signing of the amendment by Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein appoints Indyke as a trustee of his 2018 Trust and for any trust created for Karyna Shuliak.
Epstein appoints Kahn as a trustee of his 2018 Trust and for any trust created for Karyna Shuliak.
Epstein appoints Ruemmler as a trustee of his 2018 Trust.
Epstein amends his trust to provide for distributions to be made for the benefit of Karyna Shuliak, potentially in a separate trust.
Both serve as co-trustees of the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2018 Trust and are designated to serve as co-trustees for any trust created for Karyna Shuliak.

events.title: Execution of First Amendment to Epstein 2018 Trust
events.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein signs the First Amendment to his 2018 Trust, which modifies distribution provisions for beneficiary Karyna Shuliak.

events.title: Creation of Jeffrey E. Epstein 2018 Trust
events.description: The original Jeffrey E. Epstein 2018 Trust agreement is established, which this document amends.

locations: Territory of the United States Virgin Islands, District of St. Thomas & St. John
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein amended his 2018 Trust in October 2018 to create a mechanism to place distributions for Karyna Shuliak into a separate trust for her benefit.
The amendment grants trustees Darren K. Indyke and Richard D. Kahn sole discretion to determine when such a protective trust for Shuliak would be beneficial.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard D. Kahn are designated to serve as the trustees of any trust created for Karyna Shuliak under this amendment.
The document was notarized by Daphne Wallace in the U.S. Virgin Islands, indicating Epstein's presence or legal activity there in October 2018.
The original trust was dated May 2018, showing ongoing financial and estate planning by Epstein in the year prior to his 2019 arrest.
